title: The Sore Losers (1997 - USA) [DE subs] action sci fi
description:
The Sore Losers (1997 - USA)

Action / Science Fiction
 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0120167/


A Big Broad Guerrilla Monster Production

The plot is elegant in its simplicity. An intergalactic serial killer named Blackie returns to Earth to complete his mission of killing 12 random people. He killed 10 people 42 years ago but was unable to finish his mission, earning him the status of a "sore loser." Somehow, it is never explained why, he has a second chance. He busts out his buddy Mike and hooks up with psychopathic Kerine.


Video: XviD, 416x320, 23.976 fps, 1002 Kbps, 01h28m08s
Audio: MP3, 44100 Hz, joint stereo, 96 kbps

DVDRip, English audio, optional German subtitles
